wordNotFound.title: oopsie!
wordNotFound.description: The word {{word}} does not exist in current list.

win.title: Good Job!
win.subTitle: You guessed the word "{{word}}" in {{attemptNr}} attempts.

cookiesDisclamer.title: Cookie/Storage notice
cookiesDisclamer.description1: This website uses cookies and similar storage technologies
cookiesDisclamer.description2-1: Essential cookies are required for the website to function correctly.
cookiesDisclamer.description2-2: Analytics cookies help us understand how visitors use the website so we can improve its performance and usability.
cookiesDisclamer.description3: We do not use cookies for advertising or cross-site tracking, and analytics data is not used to identify individual users.
